title: (x) collaboration by E.Spiekermann & C. Schwarz {gang}
content:
Spiekermann & Schwarz designed a font......and I don’t remember the name. thank you.

 [‹ schwinn logo font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081004234822/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16453 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help me ID logo fonts for each classification type. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081004234822/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16397 "Go to next forum topic")
author: david hamuel

comments.content: Christian Schwartz and Joshua Darden worked with Spiekermann on [FF Meta Headline](http://web.archive.org/web/20081004234822/http:/www.fontshop.com/virtual/newsletters/jul2005/) this year.

Or maybe this:  
 [http://www.spiekermann.com/iblog/C61720386/E20051013130639/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081004234822/http:/www.spiekermann.com/iblog/C61720386/E20051013130639/index.html "http://www.spiekermann.com/iblog/C61720386/E20051013130639/index.html")

There’s a better specimen, and I have it somewhere, but I can’t find it now, sorry.  
It’s actually a pretty interesting work.

hhp

As far as I know, Christian and Erik have collaborated on Unit and some of the additional Meta fonts (with production by Joshua Darden). Bau was a Christian Schwartz solo album.

You can read lots more on Orange Italic dot com.  
 [http://www.orangeitalic.com/type.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20081004234822/http:/www.orangeitalic.com/type.shtml "http://www.orangeitalic.com/type.shtml")
From the link I posted: “2001-2004. Art direction by Erik Spiekermann. Released by FontShop International.”
